contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 8, 1894 D Newcastle upon Tyne Olympia Contest
Newcastle upon Tyne Olympia Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
newcastle-upon-tyne-olympia-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Olympia, Newcastle 1st prize £10 and the Northern Counties Challenge Cup, 2nd £7, 3rd £4, 4th £2.10s., 5th £1.10s. Also quickstep contest: 1. West Hartlepool Old 2. Murton Colliery 3. Consett
10 bands entered, 8 competed
Prizes amounted to £28
May 21, 2011, 7:20 p.m. June 15, 2019, 12:17 p.m.
1 West Hartlepool Old Alexander Owen L'Etoile du Nord [arr. Godfrey]
2 Ashington Model George F. Birkinshaw William Tell [unknown arranger]
3 Murton Colliery Band George Raine Fierrabras
4 Consett Ironworks Thomas Woods Bellini [arr. Round]
5 Hartlepool Temperance Joseph Jackson Maritana [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Walbottle Temperance Richard Binnie Joan of Arc [Round]
Unknown Result Heworth Colliery Band Thomas Woods Selection from Weber [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Ashington Duke Thomas Woods William Tell [unknown arranger]
Unknown Result Scotswood and District Neil M. Boyd Marino Faliero [arr. Round]
